divs: sighting detailsme and my dad were standing outside talking and we looked up into the sky and saw this very brite yellow\white lite. at first we thought it was one of those chinese lanterns but this was to brite to be one of those and it moved in several diffirent directions. it was kind of scary. we watched the object for several minutes and then it blanked out!
Summary: It was very very brite! Yellow/white.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
trends: There have been 126 other sightings in Indianapolis
There was one other sighting in Indianapolis on or around July 4th 2010
